code: import GenreShow from"./genre_show";import{connect}from'react-redux';import{fetchSongsByGenre as _fetchSongsByGenre}from'../../actions/song_actions';import{playTrack as _playTrack,addTrack as _addTrack}from'../../actions/player_queue_actions';import{addSongToPlaylist as _addSongToPlaylist}from'../../actions/playlist_actions';import{openModal as _openModal,closeModal as _closeModal}from"../../actions/modal_actions";var msp=function msp(state){return{songs:state.entities.songs};};var mdp=function mdp(){return function(dispatch){return{fetchSongsByGenre:function fetchSongsByGenre(genre){return dispatch(_fetchSongsByGenre(genre));},playTrack:function playTrack(song){return dispatch(_playTrack(song));},addTrack:function addTrack(song){return dispatch(_addTrack(song));},addSongToPlaylist:function addSongToPlaylist(songId,playlistId){return dispatch(_addSongToPlaylist(songId,playlistId));},openModal:function openModal(modal,songId){return dispatch(_openModal(modal,songId));},closeModal:function closeModal(){return dispatch(_closeModal());}};};};export default connect(msp,mdp)(GenreShow);
